name: markdown-it-github
description: A markdown-it plugin to generate github style markdown.

scripts.bootstrap: npm i && git config --local "alias.cz" "!npm run git-cz"
scripts.build:log: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "docs(changelog): update CHANGELOG.md"
scripts.build:ver: conventional-recommended-bump -p angular | xargs npm --no-git-tag-version version && npm run build:log && git checkout -- package.json && conventional-recommended-bump -p angular | xargs npm version -m 'chore(release): %s'

author: miaoxingsoldier
